concept-wr.title: Managing Hardware Inventory
concept-wr.shortdesc: The maintenance and inventory component of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade allows the administrator to install, configure, and manage the hosts of the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade cluster.

conbody.p: To access the System Inventory page on the web management interface, click the Inventory option of the Admin tab on the side panel.
